message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $125, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you try to get closer to $110?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $115, but that's as low as I can go without losing money on the deal.
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway. Can you do $112.50?
I'm almost there, Bob! I can do $112.50, but I'm not going to go any lower. I'm willing to meet you halfway, just like you suggested.
